recipe.title: Banana Oat Freezer-Prep Smoothie Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; unsweetened almond milk ; (120 mL)

steps.step: Add the arugula, banana, almond butter, oats, cinnamon, turmeric, and salt to a resealable container. Cover and store in the freezer for up to 3 months.
When ready to prepare, add the contents from the container and the almond milk to a blender and blend until smooth.
